name: Ahri and Bear
description:
Ahri and Bear is a 3D puzzle adventure game, where players will take control of Ahri the cat and Bear the dog who embark on an emotional journey together to find their true home. Use Ahri and Bear's unique abilities to navigate through the daunting human world so they can find their way back home.

-The Journey Home-
Explore the massive human city of Eastview as Ahri and Bear while setting out on a quest to return home. Best friends need to stick together on this journey so use all of your wit to solve the obstacles that await Ahri and Bear in the human world.

-Puzzles-
Use Ahri and Bear's special individual skills in order to guide them through the city. Ahri's night vision allows her to see clearly in dark areas, while Bear's strength allows him to tackle heavy obstacles with ease. Climb, sniff, and even bark your way through the hardships of the world.

-Stealth-
Some humans might think Ahri and Bear are "Lost Pets" and might try to deliver them to an animal shelter. Use Ahri's cat-like stealth and Bear's canine courage to avoid these humans during your adventure.
